title: National Armenian Salaries Database
about-tool: The tool allows to see general trends of monthly salaries on Armenian IT market. Salaries are after taxes in Armenian Drams. The reported data is being translated to English and reviewed to exclude spam. If a person reported “350” salary, we make an assumption that it means 350 thousand AMD. You might request the data you submitted to be removed. To do it drop me an email to rafael@rahar.net. Data is licensed under
step1: You click on "Submit my report" button on the left;
step2: You fill-in a simple form and submit the data. That's it. No authentication or personal data needed.
